S:log-item.D:comment: LUCENE-4337: Add a SecurityManager to run tests using a custom policy file, disallowing write/delete access outside ${build.dir} and listening network sockets on any other address than 127.0.0.1:1024-. This also fixes failing Solr tests because of creating index in example folder or listening on 0.0.0.0 (JMX)
